title: Tesla Optimus
description: Tesla Optimus is a humanoid robot designed to perform manual tasks, blending AI with robotics for future labor automation.
fullDescription: Tesla's Optimus (also known as the Tesla Bot) is a general-purpose humanoid robot under development by Tesla, Inc. It was unveiled by Elon Musk during Tesla's AI Day event in August 2021. Designed to handle tasks that are repetitive, dangerous, or boring for humans, Optimus aims to revolutionize industries by introducing an affordable, autonomous, and safe labor force. Built with Tesla's expertise in AI, autopilot hardware, and energy systems, the robot represents Tesla's ambition to extend its AI capabilities beyond vehicles.

specifications.Sensors: Autopilot cameras, FSD (Full Self-Driving) hardware, force feedback sensing, tactile sensors
specifications.Runtime: Designed for a full day of work on a single charge (claimed)

capabilities: Mobility: Walking at a moderate pace, navigating complex environments
Dexterity: Manipulating objects, using tools, picking up delicate or heavy items
Perception: Understanding its environment via cameras and sensors (similar to Tesla's vehicle perception stack)
Cognition: Basic decision-making, simple conversations, and task learning through demonstrations
Safety: Designed with lightweight materials and limited physical power to minimize risk to humans
applications: Industrial: Assisting in manufacturing, warehouse logistics, and material handling
Domestic: Performing household chores, running errands
Commercial: Serving in retail, restaurants, and customer service roles
Healthcare: Supporting elderly or disabled individuals with daily activities
Space and Exploration: Long-term potential to assist in extraterrestrial missions where human labor is costly and risky

title: Boston Dynamics Atlas
description: Atlas is a bipedal humanoid robot designed for mobility and agility in rough terrain, showcasing advanced dynamic movement capabilities.
fullDescription: Boston Dynamics Atlas is a bipedal humanoid robot designed for a variety of search and rescue tasks. It stands 6 feet tall and weighs 190 pounds, making it one of the most advanced humanoid robots in existence. Atlas can walk bipedally leaving the upper limbs free to lift, carry, and manipulate the environment. In extremely challenging terrain, Atlas is strong and coordinated enough to climb using hands and feet, to pick its way through congested spaces.
capabilities: Dynamic walking and running on rough terrain

title: iRobot Roomba i7+
description: The Roomba i7+ is an autonomous vacuum cleaner with smart mapping and self-emptying capabilities for effortless home cleaning.
fullDescription: The iRobot Roomba i7+ represents a significant advancement in robotic vacuum technology. It features Imprint Smart Mapping, which allows it to learn and map your home, giving you complete control to clean and schedule by room. The Clean Base Automatic Dirt Disposal allows the i7+ to empty itself for up to 60 days, making it a truly hands-free cleaning solution.
capabilities: Voice control via Alexa and Google Assistant
